title: The Three Others
description: In the book, you will go through the most psychological thriller. suspense in every part of the story let's you to a new level of mystery in the crimes that is been done. You will see a man who has covered his face fighting against all the odds.Its about a man who is weird himself and in a lonely station gets stuck with three people who are blaming him for the crimes he has not done and he has no way to get out of that lonely dark subway station. Read more to figure the mystery of him getting out of the situation.
author: Mohammad Ali V
